title: Mesa Verde National Park: Education
body: A Mesa Verde Educational Experience Whether planning a field trip to Mesa Verde or learning about the parkÂ in the classroom, our education pages will help you to create a memorial experience for your students.  Find useful resources for planning a field trip. Download lesson plans, activities, and other resources for use in the classroom or field trip. Prepare your students to be respectful stewards while visiting the park.                  Educational Entrance Fee Waiver Teachers planning a visit to the park with their students may want to apply for an educational entrance fee waiver.
